Class FreeHandObject

java.lang.Object
  Shape
      FreeHandObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FreeHandObject
extends Shape

Implements a freehand drawing segment, which really consists of a bunch of lines.

See Also:
